titleStmt.title: The second booke of questions and answers vpon Genesis. Containing those questions that are most eminent and pertinent, from the sixt to the fiueteenth chapter of the same booke. Collected out of ancient and recent writers: briefly propounded and expounded. / By Alexander Rosse, of Aberden, preacher at Saint Maries neere Southampton and one of his Maiesties Chaplaines.
titleStmt.author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Legatt, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the White Lyon.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the White Lyon.
